Header: “Brian Banks” set to release this Friday
Content: “Brian Banks” is a 2019 American biographical drama film directed by Tom Shadyac and starring Aldis Hodge as Brian Banks. This film is based on the true story of Brian Banks, a man who was accused of rape but with help of a lawyer of The California Innocence Project was cleared of the charges. Brian and his lawyer must not only clear his name but also continue his dream to play with the NFL eventually playing for the Atlanta Falcons. The movie is set to release this Friday.
